title: Will Gumi Ban For Macros?
snippet: Will Gumi ban an account for using macros? I think not.I’ve automated farming in FFBE: WOTV for thousands of hours at this point and my account hasn’t received any punishment. There are people that use my macro/bot tool (macro? bot? basically the same thing) to automate farming and they haven’t r...

title: 60 FPS WOTV on BlueStacks
snippet: After playing 60 FPS WOTV on BlueStacks I don’t want to go back to my mobile device.
